'''Millelith's Watch''' is the eleventh original [[soundtrack]] album to be released for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features a total of 40 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, each one an original composition for [[The Chasm]]. The album is divided into three discs: ''Wrinkled Peaks'', ''Underground Adventures'', and ''Battles of the Chasm''.

The album was first announced on May 20, 2022, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 2.7]]. The tracklist was announced on June 19 and the album was later released on June 22.<ref>Bilibili: [https://t.bilibili.com/673334173613686792?spm_id_from=333.999.0.0 《原神》层岩巨渊主题OST即将上线]</ref>
